frontmatter.title: The SaaS CTO Security Checklist Redux
frontmatter.description: Doing the basics goes a long way in keeping your company and product secure. This third1 edition of the SaaS CTO Security Checklist provides actionable security best practices CTOs (or anyone for that matter) can use to harden their security. This list is far from exhaustive, incomplete by nature since the security you need depends on your company, product, and assets.
frontmatter.creator: goldfiglabs

frontmatter.title: 10 Insights from Adopting TypeScript at Scale
